author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia's Novak says Russia and Iran may extend bilateral oil deal for five years: TASS
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russia’s Energy Minister Alexander Novak said on Tuesday that Russia and Iran could extend a bilateral deal on oil supplies for five years when it runs out at the end of the year, the TASS news agency reported.
FILE PHOTO: Russian Energy Minister Alexander Novak attends the Gas Exporting Countries Forum Summit in Santa Cruz, Bolivia November 23, 2017. REUTERS/David Mercado/File Photo “It has been extended for the year, but in general, we think it should be extended for five years,” Novak was Quote: d by RIA news agency as saying.
Reporting by Gabrielle Tétrault-Farber; Editing by Adrian Croft
